name: Persona 5 The Animation Style LoRA
description:
Persona 5 The Animation style LoRA

Making models can be expensive. Do you like what I do? Consider supporting me on Patreon 🅿️ or feel free to buy me a coffee ☕


Completing the family of Persona 5 styles, this LoRA is good at imitating the style from the anime and the game cutscenes. Should work fine on AnyLoRA and similar models at around weight 1. Increase the fidelity with the trigger persona5 anime style.

Keep in mind this is not a character LoRA, so while it can imitate characters from their descriptions (as shown) you might need additional character LoRA/embedding to increase the accuracy. The purpose of this LoRA is to make any character with this style, not only Persona characters. Like the Futaba examples are using her TI.

For the game artwork style, try out my Persona / Catherine (Soejima Shigenori) Style LoRA. It's a bit old, but it should work just fine.

How to use LoRA's in auto1111:

  • Update webui (use git pull like here or redownload it)

  • Copy the file to stable-diffusion-webui/models/lora

  • Select your LoRA like in this video

  • Make sure to change the weight (by default it's :1 which is usually too high)
